settings.editor: Pisanello’s Italian Restaurant attracts a varied clientele, including an extremely loyal following of regular patrons, Italian food aficionados, tourists, and celebrities. They enjoy the restaurant’s remarkable signature dishes, including succulent Veal Chops Siciliano, spicy Lobster Fra Diavolo, tender Chicken Contadina, and savory Calamari stuffed with seafood. Spectacular seafood such as Striped Bass Marechiare, Lobster Oreganata, and Shrimp Scampi are always requested, as are meat favorites like Sirloin Steak Pizzaiola with Peppers and Mushrooms, Stuffed Veal Chop Marsala, and Chicken Livers Cacciatora.

His career goes through reputable restaurants in Italy and Greece. The Italian and Mediterranean cuisine are his hobby and passion, and he puts in it skills more than 10 years.he Culinary style of Chief Eric would surprise you pleasantly with original combinations of flavors and tastes. Creativity spirit and elegance which are the trademark of every dish prepared by Chief Eric bring true delight for each guest of Pisanello restaurant.
Poached in a light sauce of garlic, tomato, and white wine
Prosciutto di parma, fresh mozzarella, roasted peppers, arugula, balsamic dressing

settings.title: Stuffed Pork Chop with Vinegar Peppers

settings.editor: Stuffed with mozzarella and prosciutto - oven-roasted with sautéd garlic and cherry
